titleStmt.title: A true relation of a dangerous plot against the vvell-affected party of the town of Lynn, discovered by a most worthy and faithfull servant to the Parliament Thomas Lovekin Major of the said town. With the articles agreed on by the Royall party concerning the said plot; wherein they expresse their desires, to restore his Sacreed [sic] Majesty to his Royall throne and dignity. / Sent in a letter from the said Major Lovekin, to his loving friend Captaine Iames Clerke, at his quarters in the Spread-Eagle at Gracious-streete in London.
titleStmt.author: Lovekin, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
